     </dependency>
   </dependencies>

-    <pluginManagement>
-       <plugins>
-         <plugin>
-           <artifactId>maven-surefire-plugin</artifactId>

-       </plugins>

     <plugins>
       <plugin>
         <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>

message:
- fix possible NPE when building a war project without dependency
- upgrade to parent snapshot (temove redundant plugin declaration)
